name: Remember Me - English
description:
SYNOPSIS

The story puts us in the shoes of Markus, a murderer who dies in the worst possible way and wakes up in a limbo between the world of the living and the world of the dead, where he must remedy his darkest and most bizarre sins committed in life. Will he get it? Or will his regrets get the better of Markus?

NOTES 1:

The game is still in development, right now it is in the beta phase, that is, it will be updated constantly, so if you do not want to miss out on information about the development, follow us on our social networks now that said, enjoy the GAME!

NOTES 2:

Please, if you try the beta, it would be appreciated if you left a comment or contact me from any social network and write the following:

  • What do you think of the game/beta?
  • Have you found any bug?
  • What things need to be improved/fixed?
  • What would you like to see in the final game
